name: Mock Sourdough Bread
author: supermk342
summary: This mock version contains the best of sourdough combined with bread.
ingredients: 4 cups all-purpose flour, or as needed, divided
directions: Heat yogurt in a microwave-safe bowl in a microwave or on the stovetop until lukewarm
Stir in yogurt, 2 cups flour, sugar, oil, and salt
Stir in enough remaining flour to make dough easy to handle
Turn dough out on a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth
Place in a greased bowl and let rise in until doubled in size, about 1 hour
Shape dough into 8 loaves; brush each lightly with cold water
Cut 3 diagonal slashes across the top of each loaf with a sharp knife
Let rise until doubled in size, about 25 minutes
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Bake in the preheated oven until they sound hollow when tapped, 30 to 35 minutes, brushing with water twice during baking time
